head.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) - Parents - Caldwell Independent School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Caldwell School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Caldwell, TX.

li.a: Board Member and Staff Contact Information
Intent to Enroll in CISD Pre-K Form 2020-2021

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.span: Caldwell ISD will be closed indefinitely. Mr. Peters, Superintendent of Caldwell ISD, provides more information about the school closure in the below CISD News broadcast.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

strong.span: April 6, 2020 - CISD News for School Closure

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.span: Our main offices at 203 N. Gray will be open for limited business. You may call from 9 a.m. to Noon for information. We are currently not accepting on sight visitors.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.span: This is our page for information about how the COVID-19, novel coronavirus, is impacting our school operation.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.span: Please do not come to our school if you are sick, running a fever, or have been exposed to COVID-19.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.span: UIL has cancelled all athletic activities until May 6th. No Athletic practices will be allowed this week. No gatherings of more than 10 will be allowed.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

strong.span: What to do with the Kids?

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px
p.span: During the closing we will provide lessons through the CISD On-Line Learning Center at https://sites.google.com/caldwellisd.net/cisd-learning-center/home. On this site, you will have access to each grade level's lesson plan, added resources, the CISD Libraries, the Social-Emotional Learning Center, and the CISD On-Line Information Center. For convenient access, the homepage has a tab entitled "On-Line Learning Center" or you may access the site through the "Resource" heading on the homepage.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

span.style: font-family: Open Sans, apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, Segoe UI, Helvetica Neue, arial, sans-serif
span.span: Food distribution has been changed for the duration of our school closure. Please refer to the video and the information below.

p.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left; padding: 0px; margin: 0px

strong.span: April 6, 2020 - CISD News for Lunch Update
Updated List of Lunch Drop Off Sites Day and Time
Lista actualizada de días y la hora del sitio para recoger lonches

td.p: We have decided to increase social distancing by limiting drop off days to Monday and Thursday. Monday will feed for Monday through Wednesday and Thursday will feed Thursday and Friday. This will begin on Thursday April 9, 2020 with a Thursday and Friday meals in one pickup. The locations and times will remain the same.

ul.li: 11:30 am to 11:50 am Caldwell Motel HWY 21
12:00 pm to 12:20 pm Cade Lake Church
12:30 pm to 12:50 pm Cade Lake Volunteer Fire Department
11:30 am to 11:50 am Strickland Funeral Home
12:00 pm to 12:20 pm Freeman Town In front of the school
12:30 pm to 12:50 pm St. Mary’s Catholic Church
11:45 am to 12:05 pm Belltown St. Paul’s Community Church CR 347
12:30 pm to 12:50 pm Deanville Volunteer Fire Department
11:30 am to 11:50 am Hix Baptist Church (FM 2000)
12:30 pm to 12:50 pm Chriesman Community Center

p.strong: Site Locations have not CHANGED: ​You can also still pick up lunches at the following

ul.li: 11:00 am to 1:00 pm Elementary/Intermediate Cafeteria
11:00 am to 1:00 pm Middle School Cafeteria
11:00 am to 1:00 pm Bus Barn

td.p: Hemos decidido que vamos aumentar el distanciamiento social. Limitando los días a Lunes y Jueves para recoger los lonches para los estudiantes. El Lunes se recoge lonches para 3 dias para el Lunes a miércoles. El Jueves se recoge lonches para 2 dias para el Jueves y Viernes.
Esto comenzará el Jueves 9 de abril de 2020 con una comida para el Jueves y Viernes sola en una recogida.
Las locacionees y los tiempos seguirán siendo los mismos.

ul.li: 11:30 am a 11:50 am Motel de Caldwell sobre carretera 21
12:00 pm a 12:20 pm Iglesia Cade Lake
12:30 pm a 12:50 pm Departamento de Bomberos Voluntarios de Cade Lake
11:30 am a 11:50 am Funeraria Strickland
12:00 pm a 12:20 pm Freeman Town Frente a la escuela
12:30 pm a 12:50 pm Iglesia Católica de St. Mary's
11:45 am a 12:05 pm Iglesia Comunitaria de Bell Town St. Paul CR 347
12:30 pm a 12:50 pm Departamento de Bomberos Voluntarios de Deanville
11:30 am a 11:50 am Iglesia Bautista Hix (FM 2000)
12:30 pm a 12:50 pm Centro Comunitario Chriesman

p.strong: También puede recoger lonches en los siguientes sitios:

ul.li: 11:00 am to 1:00 pm Elementary/Intermediate Cafeteria
11:00 am to 1:00 pm Middle School Cafeteria
11:00 am to 1:00 pm Bus Barn

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif

p.span: COVID-19 Current Risk Assessment (from the CDC. See links below for additional information).

ul.style: font-size: 17px; font-family: 'Open Sans', apple-system, blinkmacsystemfont, 'Segoe UI', 'Helvetica Neue', arial, sans-serif; text-align: left

li.span: For the majority of people, the immediate risk of being exposed to the virus that causes COVID-19 is thought to be low. There is not widespread circulation in most communities in the United States.
People in places where ongoing community spread of the virus that causes COVID-19 has been reported are at elevated risk of exposure, with increase in risk dependent on the location.
Healthcare workers caring for patients with COVID-19 are at elevated risk of exposure.
Close contacts of persons with COVID-19 also are at elevated risk of exposure.

Travelers returning from affected international locations where community spread is occurring also are at elevated risk of exposure, with increase in risk dependent on location. https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/summary.html

div.span: What Your Can Do to Help Prevent the Spread of this Disease?

li.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
Use hand sanitizer when you cannot wash.
Avoid touching your eyes, ears, nose and mouth with unwashed hands.
Avoid close contact with sick people.
Stay home when you are sick.
Cover your mouth and news with the side of your elbow when you sneeze or cough.
Clean and disinfect frequently touched items.

div.div: Additional Information provided by State, Local and National Health Departments.
